title: Square Root to the Nth Power Calculation
description: SQRTN calculates the N-fold root of X as follows:
name: SQRTN

input.name: X
input.description: The base number for which the Nth root needs to be calculated.

input.name: N
input.description: The exponent indicating the degree of the root to compute. Must be greater than 0.

output.name: SQRTN
output.description: The computed Nth root of X, or 0 if N is less than or equal to 0.

return_value.description: The result of the Nth root calculation.
